entry.title: Cotton Wet Mop Cut-End - X-Large (32oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: INDUSTRIES MANN
Type: Wet Mop
Price: 10.58

This is an industrial-grade narrow band wet mop for general purpose cleaning. Manufactured with high grade cotton yarn, which is extremely absorbent with excellent floor drying qualities. These value-priced mops can be considered semi-disposable, as laundering is not recommended for any cut-end mop. All cotton mops must be broken in by soaking in water overnight to remove natural oils and debris. Use with any narrow band mop handle, such as Quickway or EZ-Change models.

 

Type  General Purpose
Material Cotton
Colour Natural
Sold/price per Unit

entry.title: BacStop Antimicrobial Wet Mop Synthetic Looped-End - X-Large (32oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ATLAS GRAHAM
Type: Wet Mop
Price: 21.68

Bacstop yarn is impregnated with an antimicrobial agent that inhibits the growth of bacteria. It's a practical choice wherever mopping is performed in view of the public (for example in restaurants or retail environments). Bacstop yarn prevents the off-putting odour produced by typical mops when they remain damp for extended periods of time. This anti-microbial feature extends the life of the mop by combating yarn breakage that can be caused by mop rot. The looped end construction keeps the yarn ends from linting-off. This maximizes the mop's service life when properly laundered.

  • Antimicrobial treatment in BacStop inhibits the growth of bacteria, fungi, mold, and mildew in the mop yarn
  • Treatment remains active after repeated use and washings
Type General Use
Mop Weight 32oz
Size X-Large
Style Attached, Narrow Band, Looped End
Material Synthetic
Colour Blue

entry.title: MicroPet™ Eco Series Wet Mop Microfibre Looped-End - Large (24oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: M2 PROFESSIONAL
Type: Wet Mop
Price: 17.69

  • Highly absorbent mop with mid retention is perfect for any general cleaning application
  • High resistance to chemicals and disinfectants
  • Break-in is not necessary
  • Made with next generation microfiber and PET plastic bottles, this mop can be used in healthcare environments
